titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of November 20, 2023, through December 20, 2023, as "National Survivors of Homicide Victims Awareness Month".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of November 20, 2023, through December 20, 2023, as "National Survivors of Homicide Victims Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of November 20-December 20, 2023, as National Survivors of Homicide Victims Awareness Month.
